attributes.action: Each year if secondary school going on different week days for years not to mix
attributes.additional_details: This would stop different years from mixing, this would also make teachers who are more vulnerable stay safer and would help pupils keep their families safer.
attributes.background: Different year groups going on different days to keep different years from mixing, this would make it harder for the virus to spread and keeping families safe in the pandemic. For example: year 7-Mondays, Year 8-Tuesday, Year 9- Wednesday

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Require schools to adopt a part-time attendance rota while Covid-19 is a threat
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/551615
